parameters.name: Roland JV-880
parameters.description: Roland JV-880 Multi Timbral Synthesizer Module

parameterGroup.name: System Common
parameterGroup.description: In the System Edit mode, the System Common parameters those related to the entire unit (such as master tuning) can be edited.

parameter.name: Master Tune
parameter.description: This parameter controls the overall tuning (pitch) of the JV-880. The value is expressed as the frequency of the A4 key. The greater the value, the higher the pitch.
